early.description: Born in a militarized colony, you were trained from a young age to handle weapons, developing physical strength and discipline.
You witnessed a raider attack that claimed the lives of friends, instilling in you a desire to protect others.
Your family was part of the colony's defense force; their stories inspired you to follow in their footsteps.
Surviving a harsh wilderness alone after getting lost, you learned self-reliance and toughness.
Bullied by older kids, you fought back and earned a reputation for being tough and unyielding.
You formed a childhood pact with friends to defend the colony, fostering loyalty and camaraderie.
An encounter with a xeno creature left you scarred but determined to become stronger.
You excelled in physical training exercises, catching the eye of the colony's defense instructors.
A family member's betrayal taught you to be cautious and to rely on your own strength.
You crafted your first weapon from scrap materials, showing ingenuity and a readiness to defend.
Witnessing injustice within the colony, you vowed to uphold the law and protect the innocent.
You survived a severe illness that many did not, strengthening your body and willpower.
A mentor taught you advanced combat techniques, accelerating your development.
You participated in a rite of passage that tested your physical limits, emerging victorious.
An accident during training left you with a minor injury, teaching you the importance of caution.
You defended a weaker peer from bullies, beginning your path as a protector.
Your quick reflexes saved you from a dangerous fall, highlighting your agility.

mid.description: You successfully led a defense against a small raider attack, earning recognition from colony leaders.
A close friend fell in battle, fueling your desire for vengeance and justice.
You trained in advanced combat techniques, becoming proficient with various weapons.
An ethical dilemma forced you to choose between orders and what you felt was right.
You infiltrated a raider camp to gather intelligence, showcasing bravery and cunning.
A leadership role in the colony's militia tested your abilities to command and strategize.
You discovered corruption within the colony's leadership, challenging your loyalty and convictions.
An injury sustained in battle required you to adapt your fighting style.
You developed a rivalry with another enforcer, pushing you both to greater heights.
Protecting a convoy through dangerous territory, you demonstrated courage under fire.
You trained a group of new recruits, passing on your skills and instilling discipline.
A moral conflict arose when you were ordered to suppress a peaceful protest.
You single-handedly defended a remote outpost from a xeno threat until reinforcements arrived.
A tactical error on your part led to casualties, leaving you with guilt and a determination to improve.
You recovered an ancient weapon or artifact, adding a valuable asset to the colony's defenses.
Negotiating with a rival faction avoided unnecessary bloodshed, showcasing unexpected diplomatic skills.
You participated in a joint operation with corporate forces, exposing you to new tactics and technology.

late.description: Promoted to a high-ranking position, you now oversee the colony's entire defense strategy.
You led a successful campaign to eliminate a major raider threat, bringing peace to the region.
Facing a mutiny within your ranks, you had to restore order while questioning your leadership methods.
An old enemy resurfaced, challenging you to confront your past decisions and their consequences.
You discovered a plot against the colony from within, forcing you to act swiftly to prevent disaster.
An offer to join a larger military organization tempted you with new opportunities and challenges.
You trained in advanced tactics and technology off-world, returning with new ideas that met resistance.
A personal loss led you to question the constant cycle of violence, sparking an internal conflict.
You negotiated a peace treaty with a long-standing enemy, but some viewed this as a betrayal.
An assassination attempt on you revealed hidden enemies and tested your survival skills.
You began training the next generation of enforcers, leaving a lasting legacy.
A crisis forced you to ally with former adversaries, challenging your perceptions and adaptability.
You uncovered ancient technology that could tip the balance of power, leading to tough ethical choices.
A massive xeno threat emerged, requiring you to coordinate with other colonies for survival.
You faced a tribunal for actions taken during a conflict, forcing you to defend your decisions.
Disillusioned with constant warfare, you considered leaving the enforcers to seek a different path.
A final, decisive battle tested all your skills and resolved, leaving a profound impact on your future.
